text:
Wow this place is as amazing as it is massive.. I was blissfully lost in a Labyrinth of beautiful paintings and sculptures..  There are 2 sections to visit and I highly recommend spending at least an hour or 2 to visit both..    This place definitely deserves a bigger following. I can't say I minded having the whole place to myself though ;)   If you appreciate fine art in a beautifully curated pristine gallery, then be sure to make your way there. I felt privileged to have had the opportunity to do so.

I am editing this review because I just read someone else's review saying that it was humid and had no Air Conditioning. When I just went 3 days ago there was definitely A/C and it was not Humid at all.. very comfortable.  Enjoy
A great exhibition of Demos Chiang’s work and some contemporary Chinese artists! Great place to spend an afternoon immersing into art and understanding of the artists’ motivations.
Offers to immerse you into the artist’s perspective and ensures you do not leave home empty handed

Take the lift near to SAM’s entrance and go up to level 5.

Presenting contemporary and up-and-coming young artists in this huge gallery space.

However, do brace yourself for the humid temperature here without aircond.
Brilliant new art space opened October 2023 with both retrospective and new art exhibitions - check their exhibition calendar for details.
